title: Ep. 152 S&A Investor - Legendary Investor David Dreman Unplugged
itunes:title: Legendary Investor David Dreman Unplugged
description: Legendary investor, David Dreman, says to buy stocks right now.  He also discusses the implications of QE3, shares some of his favorite ideas, and explains why he feels bad for most investors.
